children.children: Lawn Chair is a software development & design studio cofounded by Patrick Burtchaell, Jon Carl, Liam Craver and Ryan Campbell. Both the company branding and website were designed by Patrick.

The goal for the company branding was to relfect the happy and playful nature of the company without breaking the rational, ordered design principles I embrace in my design work. We want to portray ourselves as a company that does great work, but certainly not afraid to have fun at the same time.
